title: Papuvege - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Fast food, Take-out only
description: Food truck selling vegan burgers and vegetarian toast. Location changes so check ahead its webpage for updates. Most of days on Pomorska 171/173 from 1-5 pm at front of the Philology Department of the University of Lodz. Sometimes at Park Biznesu Teofilów on Traktorowa 141/143 or near the Office Łódź 1 on Piłsudskiego 22.
